Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for LAX”
Reviews.Author: Mira G
Reviews.Content: stayed ramada easter think perfect choise hotel located 5 min walk central station located 15 min airport train stayed star room 5 floor great view roof amsterdam noise hear room room yes wasnt big nice trendy also bathroom bit strange traveling friends star rooms 5 6 floor floors look old used booked room incl arrived told french means coffe wanted normal pay 75 day got great think could informed french booking walk hotel things se amsterdam also went outside amsterdam great park many beautiful flowers took train bus directly park incl entrance spend day people amsterdam helpful nice speak great english great city nice thing know amsterdam many fast track tickets museums incl rembrandt go directly entrance instead standing long line remember

Reviews.Title: “Too noisy”
Reviews.Author: FrankG1955
Reviews.Content: went long weekend reading reviews hotels booking stayed fri including breakfast last minute unfortunately working still going floors 4 5 6 first arrived hotel power taken fix air con pleasantly told week 8am left luggage arrived 2pm official booking time given room 3rd floor view windows hotel noise importantly twin beds told rooms double bed eventually agreed change rooms room view outside 1st floor gave us bedding double bed fit 2 single beds seems 2 want double bed days back good points hotel prime position central station main shopping area although tram stop outside hotel noise horrendous trams regular dont complain waiting one run get taxi make sure ask fare meter otherwise rip first night back club area next night meter behind hotel street red light windows quite think stuck night breakfast good nice variety things would want three choice hot food day every day scrambled egg choice either bacon sausage little pancakes thing didnt look like something would want breakfast never ate hotel mainly due vast restaurants available nice steak house hotel fitness first gym across street make sure bring plenty money cost everything gone since last went managed spend come back 2

Reviews.Title: “Good if your just sleeping at night”
Reviews.Author: SaraB73
Reviews.Content: husband two friends stayed hotel 5th till 7th feb loved everything ideal location staff lovely friendly hotel clean everything needed wanted husband going back summer hotel

Reviews.Title: “Super 8 LAX ... Not A Problem”
Reviews.Author: ericthelot
Reviews.Content: lucky room top floor overlooking back hotel beautiful view across whole amsterdam annex red light district room big big bathroom look rooms floor maid cleaning doors open looked really view lift shaft think common floors would recommend view room accept think room front hotel would noisy think would norm city centre locations lack air con would problem summer overall get pay cheap book line place lay head clean staff pleasant location brilliant close enough drag cases central station amsterdam brilliant coffee shops red light district apart quick look see beautiful parks canals laid back pubs restaurants clubs lovely museums good value something everyone walk away centre love

Reviews.Title: “great value, spacious room”
Reviews.Author: briarbeard
Reviews.Content: good location close close city centre

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't even pick me up at the airport.”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel many times hotel clean friendly staff comfortable rooms good breakfast good location

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: nancy_siesta_key
Reviews.Content: working travel time berlin number occasions asked take group travel trip city hotel base rooms spacious clean breakfast typical german continental plenty choice restaurant great views staff great especially bar man evening went way helpful friendly location isnt good hotels stayed however public transport berlin outstanding u stations close reach main attractions would stay hotel lovely

Reviews.Title: “Plesant stay at a nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: depechegirl02
Reviews.Content: service excellent room good standard took time find find reception one elevator could problem

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, clean, friendly and reasonably priced”
Reviews.Author: donandmar
Reviews.Content: clean business hotel located close trade fair center late interior design furniture clean quiet ok restaurants walking distance good value

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Rasika_Raghavan
Reviews.Content: hotel main lobby top floor 7th one elevator go another solo elevator go bedrooms every time want go pass reception switch elevator smell restaurant sure practical staff location ok got room big enormous window bathtub without shower curtains bad side complete lack small tv almost without channels bad mattress breakfast ok room nice 1 pc free internet good hotel im sure find money

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: steena18
Reviews.Content: service security staff excellent 2nd time less three years stay return berlin stay recommendation would make try room face directly could bit noisy window open night perfect train connections main berlin ease access

Reviews.Title: “Actually very good”
Reviews.Author: frank_czech
Reviews.Content: hotel bad receptionist staffs look us don’t money pay good say deserves 2 stars normal hotel features service facility breakfast price expensive hotel offer confirmed us double room checked 2 connecting bad rooms everything hotel charged including internet tv room bathroom facility addition breakfast really limited say 2 star breakfast places note careful high charged go book directly hotel better stay hotels

Reviews.Title: “Not bad room, cheap but unfriendly”
Reviews.Author: binder-dundatt
Reviews.Content: checking asked second bed room arriving berlin stopped room assumed room sofa bed sightseeing amazing returned room evening couch couch called front desk ask another bed sent room rudely told requested bed would request new bed morning night requested second bed passed desk morning days sightseeing returned room discover second bed room called desk immediately sent woman bed apologized claimed front desk busy previous evening forgotten put order sort service would expected nice hotel aside ok breakfast bar nice overpriced rooms decent though tiles broken sink bathroom come back berlin wed likely stay somewhere else

Reviews.Title: “Functional Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Radarz
Reviews.Content: enjoyable stay front desk staff pleasant helpful rooms large bright reception floor attached delightful outdoor patio great view bartender pleasantly insisted drink german wine beer breakfast excellent lots great restaurants within walking distance rent bikes provide reduced rates fitness centre across street

Reviews.Title: “...don't ask more”
Reviews.Author: MrGu
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights hotel chosen based reviews disappointed hotel nice rooms ok breakfast ok feel safe also breakfast nice room stay feel home staff helpful close hotel found nice shops ubahn buses close also shop gourmet food 100 away go berlin definitely stay hotel perhaps must add stayed hotel stayed two nights 5star hotel berlin hotel course luxurious personal cosy hotel

Reviews.Title: “A really convenient no-frills stop-over”
Reviews.Author: StefRich
Reviews.Content: husband two children ages 8 10 stayed property 6 days room spacious clean beautiful view windows open big children nice know glass outside building well cool worry bathroom super big bathtub absolutely fabulous appreciated walking around beautiful berlin comfortable sofa bed comfy big bed husband hidden away well appointed kitchen kitchen couple sink refrigerator say nice know could wanted desk television english language much preferred watching home improvement german breakfast extensive well stocked every morning sausage bacon eggs rolls croissants fresh fruit cold meats cheeses tea coffee list could go impressed breakfast included room rate europe trip month dont hesitate say favorite hotel around hotel block away goes anywhere berlin time also u station right outside door go back berlin soon hope certainly stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Super8 lax”
Reviews.Author: fantlot
Reviews.Content: stayed berlin 5 nights found met needs hotel benefits close attention owners clearly trained staff well example extensive breakfast bar regularly refreshed even end breakfast service hotel convenient station 150 meters away

Reviews.Title: “Noisy and dirty”
Reviews.Author: juan171071
Reviews.Content: great hotel central 1 min away train 5 minutes bus right 57 minutes zoo main attractions shops pharmacy eating places around corner reception located 7th floor unusual ever checked close roof view cafe balcony city nice helpful staff clean comfortable rooms soundproof windows would need windows shop around corner prices germany pretty low buy thats way go price hotel also pretty reasonable booked bookings enjoy

Reviews.Title: “I loved it and will come back!”
Reviews.Author: arunkool
Reviews.Content: returned long weekend berlin stayed excellent hotel found staff helpful able answer question best place eat whats best places go sight seeing short amount time hotel easy reach train underground hotel bedrooms comfortable plenty space lovely bathroom large showers plenty hot water small kitchen area breakfast excellent buffet style left much ate five others stayed 3 double rooms weekend trip agreed hotel excellent value money hope review helps

Reviews.Title: “Good Choice”

Reviews.Content: summer hot days arrived ac told well get fan staff went crazy said want transfer hotel ac beds extremely soft like dont know wrote previous reviews maybe someone management decent english staff dont

Reviews.Title: “Urine smell in the AC”
Reviews.Author: HeavyTravels
Reviews.Content: returned berlin stayed hotel found like pictures internet found hotel high standard warm friendly staff excellent helpful breakfast excellent ample choice everyone location hotel excellent exploring underground 2 minutes walk five minute walk round corner buses stop road means plan route transport system easy get around ran regularly would certainly stop would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “exactly what we were looking for”
Reviews.Author: cmonsoboss
Reviews.Content: hotel different normal chain hotels started service caring definitely miss attraction crew also different fact reception restaurant located floor take breakfast roof garden terrace enjoy wonderful view city also liked design hotel warm feel home atmosphere together good location near hotel real

Reviews.Title: “Great for a Night”
Reviews.Author: jrleeper
Reviews.Content: problem stood front airport wait hour seems kind communication problem hotel staff shuttle driver knows hotel pretty good price keep eye budget car good option close venice beach car

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: EmmaBelgium
Reviews.Content: agree reviews noisy sleep flights stopped early call also basic room need renovation first experience super 8 unfortunately second couple days later id booked hotwire couldnt cancel first negative experience last time use prices arent much lower totally changes plans

Reviews.Title: “Clean and efficient”
Reviews.Author: AngelenePenguin
Reviews.Content: wanted something close lax landed noon flew next day 11pm tried take nap point first day impossible literally sounded like going hit room every time flew expected airport hotel wanted warn anybody else night flight like expect sleep outside midnight 6am fly late start early bed clean found check friendly greek restaurant next door friendly food good priced check fast friendly issues shuttle picking noon driving back 9pm drivers friendly internet free slow thing would note dont cell phone found shuttle impossible read phones located airport call hotel one knew someone working called hotel cell phone also elevators taking luggage second level pain

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: ktown_traveller04
Reviews.Content: explained hotel management reviews back hotels near lax use shuttle service seems however use others called shuttle pickup around pm hour later two calls shuttle arrived wait saw shuttles hotels go numerous times shuttle plaza mentioned later went least three times next day flight leave late evening checked informed last shuttle left 12 noon check time guy front desk suggested could afraid walk three blocks use allow us store luggage 530 pm luggage away shuttle internet print boarding pass free 5 minimum plus room small clean passed bed bug

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay - friendly staff, no issues, definitely recommend for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: florida_snowboarder
Reviews.Content: moving two small children broke trip overnight la long flight glad stayed met needs aaa booking directly site great value room two queen beds clean room bigger many weve stayed even couch perfect last minute calls luggage internet worked really well free breakfast standard super 8 basic cereals muffins beverages seating area open time part checkin area great us food allowed fix microwave rest family ordered food restaurant delivered convenient made use laundry enjoyed lot area felt safe allowed kids run steam airport station supposed able call hotels shuttle service order hotels fault super phone number called cell phone noted phone call needs placed order get shuttle service waited 15 minutes call shuttle plenty room massive amount luggage returned airport next day shuttle left hour drivers helpful friendly helped us bags shuttles free tip drivers help luggage drawback sensitive sleeper planes pretty loud exhausted didnt bother us bit couldnt hear anything rooms outside planes perhaps ear plugs would also one time hot water ran fairly quickly one hour later back full

Reviews.Title: “Great (Clean) Place, Centrally Located, Excellent Staff.”
Reviews.Author: Ex_Calibur_Mumbai
Reviews.Content: never got stay hotel many issues picking airport like show shuttle stood 1 saw one shuttle passed traffic course dont single shuttle guy shuttles tried get shuttle couldnt slept lax airport never going stay aware u need shuttle pick u

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Convenient!”
Reviews.Author: jsandz
Reviews.Content: frills hotel great choice convenient airport shuttle driver friendly extremely helpful greek restaurant attached hotel excellent

Reviews.Title: “good value for a needed layover”
Reviews.Author: ggintruckee
Reviews.Content: needed hotel room 1 night stay lax area reading reviews site decided book room hotel needed clean room sleep thats exactly got room quite spacious clean free breakfast good pay parking plus well could hear planes flying overhead wasnt point definitely got worth would stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice Functional Hotel”
Reviews.Author: travelisgood4u
Reviews.Content: stayed wanted days la somewhere close airport hotel served purpose somewhere sleep night whilst exploring day hired car cheap werent expecting much begin breakfast included basic toast cereal juice tea coffee good enough must say isnt best area didnt go walking around night wifi free extremely slow close airport wasnt loud

Reviews.Title: “Good, inexpensive place for the night”
Reviews.Author: sydney59602
Reviews.Content: needed inexpensive decent place stay night la place served purpose well rooms clean bed comfortable though room bit small adequate bathroom clean well lit motel opposite airport bit noisy sounds landing taking parking free continental breakfast breakfast basic hot items company made muffins cereals breads items coffee juice check check smooth need inexpensive clean place spend night dont mind noise airport motel great option

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and internet for my teenaged daughter”
Reviews.Author: altheajean1954
Reviews.Content: wow stayed crowne plaza prior place 100 better room lovely clean free internet free breakfast great variety cable tv channels close airport free shuttle bus value money late checkout friendly staff overall would recommend place back next visit lax

Reviews.Title: “Immerse yourself in the whole flying experience.”
Reviews.Author: Owlgirl54
Reviews.Content: close airport safe convenient location close car 7 block away clean helpful staff free shuttle late hours doesnt run much frequently call motel good breakfast plenty juice coffee muffins bagels cereals good noise flying building however traffic night busy conclusion arrive late la exhausted hours spent plane motel good choice however noise caused planes might issues light sleeper

Reviews.Title: “Motel says it all ......”
Reviews.Author: acoya
Reviews.Content: great rate relatively clean room right lax approach alley shuttle service prompt started 400 even though front desk people offered little advice desk people horribly rude

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what I expected and a little more”
Reviews.Author: AndyAA
Reviews.Content: else say hotel already said would say hotel functional provides bed close airport reasonable facilities relatively clean bit tired would benefit bit tidy expect price find noise unbearable aware coming lax fly right roof low final approach airport landing light sleeper need sleep would stay using stopover heading somewhere else ideal free shuttle pick airport drop back little breakfast adequate staff helpful hire car places around hotel getting hire car problem several fast food places nearby quick meal ate 1015 mins walk away hotel ideal budget traveller

Reviews.Title: “If you want no sleep, stay here”
Reviews.Author: Lorica83
Reviews.Content: good clean motel free shuttle tofrom airport free breakfast need stop la frills fuss cheap

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money!!”
Reviews.Author: Ladydi6
Reviews.Content: price pay definitely worth staying stayed one night stopover travels close airport came expecting little cheap actually offered lot free shuttle airport free wifi room nice greek restaurant arrived late didnt feel like going onsite greek restaurant god send wouldnt say food fantastic definitely filled us complaint would carpet rooms seemed little rank tended wear room guys need strip carpet put wooden floors would perfect summary perfect stopover 2 nights wouldnt spend whole vacation ps really hear flights taking landing light sleepers aware

Reviews.Title: “VERY GREAT SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: Super_Road_Runner
Reviews.Content: last night 2 week road trip booked room super 8 lax located right next rented car reception ok rooms kind mould smell bathroom although mould visible room spacious enough planes flying 1am started around 5am big issue thats get staying next airport rooms could get better though breakfast included dont expect much nice coffee morning good youre looking cheap place stay near airport hotel fine

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Max320
Reviews.Content: super 8 far nicer expensive rooms ive stayed customer service great location perfect waited 15 minutes airport shuttle arriving near midnight rental car places hotel super convenient rental car till next morning nice walk right across street pick car room general expected fancy shabby either bed like rock husband seemed enjoy bathrooms surprise nicer expected would stay needed room close lax

Reviews.Title: “no complaints”
Reviews.Author: woolnough04
Reviews.Content: hotel hotel exterior dirty got really worried room condition staircase full bad smells going hear planes taking landing wasnt concern room room really clean budget hotel bed comfortable bathroom really clean wifi wifi free connection speed acceptable breakfast breakfast simple fruit juice machine wasnt working stay burger 15 minutes walk away shuttle know supposed call hotel shuttle waited 30 minutes terminal also provide free shuttle back airport make sure tell receptionist time flight

Reviews.Title: “Adequate for before or after flying”
Reviews.Author: amp-qld
Reviews.Content: hotel nice place stay early flight lax rented car hotel right accross street made drop easy hotel new clean convenient television remote work first contacted office sent someone right away check changed everything worked great negative low flying planes bother us light sleeper might problem location points good choice

Reviews.Title: “Functional”
Reviews.Author: Allen60
Reviews.Content: placed front part hotel extremely noisy street noise cover noise turned fan ac unit noise smell found another solution turned bathroom fan left door open crack white noise fan worked like charm however sure wont appreciate electric bill next month

Reviews.Title: “Just the Ticket!”
Reviews.Author: PedroPerth
Reviews.Content: long story short visited goes school germany needed make sure got flight time werent super 8 literally 15 min drive lax booked 3 hours arrival 80 1pm checkout clean nice shower marble plenty table space smoking room quiet difficult hear rooms vending machine broken theres 5 minutes away food places area via free delivery spent like 75 us nice

Reviews.Content: reason chose place price free parking free airport shuttle also cable free wifi stayed one night son flight first thing following morning place definitely needed overall fine needed price didnt arrive 800 night basically needed place put heads close airport planes landing theyre flying bottom floor planes affect sleep vending machines outside well ice maker cannot comment pool continental breakfast thought staff courteous friendly

Reviews.Title: “Great price. Clean room. Nice staff.”

Reviews.Content: stayed first last night great location airport rented car hotel right across parking lot convenient stayed 2 different rooms clean good shower lots tv channels private used shuttle service last day right time arrived terminal 15 min hear night hardly never breakfast included price basic guess good enough consider cheap hotel perfect location one night stay arrive la ever go back la first night stay

Reviews.Content: arrived lax quite late called super 8 room shuttle service shuttle pick wait quite outside motel looks dodgy situated main road room impeccably clean one best nights sleep ever room spacious shower hot breakfast simple job heater air conditioner worked well television lot stations staff lovely helped navigate way around town giving map would stay

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for!”
Reviews.Author: esco_lets_go
Reviews.Content: stayed one night early flight catch next morning close proximity lax rooms huge clean comfortable great price breakfast dissapointing would property overnight stay

Reviews.Title: “Flight path”

Reviews.Content: stayed super 8 location first trip los angeles back 2004 january 2011 deciding take lastminute holiday able find highly discounted rate priceline per night excellent considering weekend super 8 value chain course one cant go expecting said staff great start finish nice people even request cab company number phone calling great customer service location free shuttle service lax contacted courtesy phone located every baggage claim area directly front desk theyll waste time answering tell exactly wait shuttle arrive quickly particular visit stayed room everything excellent shape thing noticed king bed actually two twins pushed together didnt realize time check obviously didnt issues room located overlooking courtyard lot quieter room parking lot side last visit free wifi always big plus greek restaurant rear property awesome greek property pool free coffeetea complimentary cereals toast although didnt amenities ice machine parking lot great working order could turned room key reviewers mentioned yes noise heard ive talked lots friends stayed every hotel lax airport area far 8 miles road terminals problem thats unique super 8 youll get anywhere noise issue book miles away airport hard time finding locations nearby stores restaurants within walking distance trip area generally nothing hotels rental car whats around burger king airport blvd block half away opposite side road visible front property 7 road direction corner airport blvd ave walking take directly area blvd n burger supermarket market pizza many others great stay definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “super price for super clean!”

Reviews.Content: clean hotel werent initially planning spend three days later seeing service cleanliness place ended near airport great tours city available must try travelers

Reviews.Title: “Still a good value”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed friends end los angeles trip completely satisfied staff helpful pleasant property well cared rooms clean comfortable able schedule guided tour los easily front desk bus picks right noticed planes landing upon checkin however rooms great price great location definitely come back future

Reviews.Title: “for an overnighter it does the trick”
Reviews.Author: Aussnowboarder
Reviews.Content: found hotel trip advisor felt good value needed layover sleep flights rooms dated clean comfortable arrived hotel 1130 pm still plenty planes flying bit noisy tried long day didnt take long fall asleep planes light sleeper may lucky breakfast one continental breakfasts long time quick bite way free shuttle wifi huge plus

Reviews.Title: “Needs some work”

Reviews.Content: title says nice functional motel close lax free shuttle service airport call motel leave luggage area new facility found clean room bothered noises reviewers complained bathroom clean plus breakfast nothing write home major eating places close thats something consider planning stay long time one night motel next car rental offices felt safe day walk anywhere night

Reviews.Title: “Not one for the kids!!!!”

Reviews.Content: made reservation found reservation person friendly answered questions shuttle motel distance airport reservation cancellation policy reserved room one night got lax late night called hotel told go wait shuttle sent pick took 30 minutes get since drop someone another terminal first got hotel desk person friendly professional stayed room second floor building set back road bothered noise room clean everything needed stay bed clean comfortable bathroom clean stocked towels soaps shampoo lotion etc coffee maker coffee ac worked tv didnt turn dont know worked mini refrigerator went office morning modest continental breakfast cereal muffins toast coffee tea juice hotel shuttle lax stops front every half hour able catch checked noticed small pool courtyard area staff shuttle driver friendly helpful found reasonably priced place stay limited budget want place sleep arent looking something good choice always glad spend 80 room night turns clean comfortable choice

Reviews.Content: hotel almost walking distance airport staff courteous helpful room clean aged daughter loved fact high speed internet excellent stayed one night waiting family members arrive la called ride airline blue van never showed calling twice ended ride another hotel van going way

Reviews.Content: lax say least interesting place stay husband spent 2 nights recently enjoyed stay much needed place flying ny san return flight australia luckily enjoy plane could see hear day noise 10pm good nights sleep office staff helpful us nearby local bus terminal giving easy instructions use metro subway well enjoyed walking restaurant meal life walk home free breakfast 24hr teacoffee nice bonus several cereals english muffins juice offer enough stop headed day transfers airport convenient efficient whilst hotels clean comfortable reasonably priced suited needs well
